posts.post_content: I love this card. It's a great card in terms of mechanics and balancing and it lets me liberally drop one-ofs into my casual decks. That said, flavor failure. No life loss, no discard, no alternate cost at all? How is that Black? Should be White. Call it Divine Inspiration and forget this whole mess ever happened.
posts.html:
I love this card. It's a great card in terms of mechanics and balancing and it lets me liberally drop one-ofs into my casual decks. That said, flavor failure. No life loss, no discard, no alternate cost at all? How is that Black? Should be White. Call it Divine Inspiration and forget this whole mess ever happened.
